sn21.11:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn21.11:1.3: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahākappinaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn21.11:1.5: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ bhikkhuṁ āgacchantaṁ odātakaṁ tanukaṁ tuṅganāsikan”ti?
sn21.11:1.8: Na ca sā samāpatti sulabharūpā yā tena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbā.
sn21.11:1.9: Yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṁ brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
sn21.11:2.2: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
